items.name: init(notificationCenter: NotificationCenter)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a notification queue for the specified notification center.

items.name: class var `default`: NotificationQueue
items.desc: Returns the default notification queue for the current thread.

items.name: func enqueue(Notification, postingStyle: NotificationQueue.PostingStyle, coalesceMask: NotificationQueue.NotificationCoalescing, forModes: [RunLoop.Mode]?)
items.desc: Adds a notification to the notification queue with a specified posting style, criteria for coalescing, and run loop mode.

items.name: func enqueue(Notification, postingStyle: NotificationQueue.PostingStyle)
items.desc: Adds a notification to the notification queue with a specified posting style.

items.name: func dequeueNotifications(matching: Notification, coalesceMask: Int)
items.desc: Removes all notifications from the queue that match a provided notification using provided matching criteria.

items.name: struct NotificationQueue.NotificationCoalescing
items.desc: The constants that specify how notifications are coalesced.

items.name: enum NotificationQueue.PostingStyle
items.desc: The constants that specify when notifications are posted.
